unnormalised: Hey everyone, just saw about solar rooftop subsidies! My cousin, Priya, in Chennai got almost Rs. 50,000 off. Seems totally worth it, especially with those crazy summer power cuts. Plus, gotta do our bit for the environment, right? Maybe I'll finally install those panels before Diwali this year. Think of all the extra lighting we could have! And the inverter could run the AC when everyone comes for Onam, after they've eaten a hearty biryani! Anyone else planning to go solar?
